Tutorial.title: Welcome to the Sports Betting App
Tutorial.description: This tutorial will guide you through the basics of using our app to bet on sports responsibly.

Tutorial.title: Dashboard
Tutorial.description: Here, you can view odds, place bets, and each bet selection prompts a quiz or tip to enhance your betting strategy.

Tutorial.title: Quiz
Tutorial.description: Answer quiz questions correctly to proceed and earn bet bucks. This interactive feature helps you learn as you play.

Tutorial.title: Bet-ed
Tutorial.description: Instead of a quiz, receive helpful tips about the bets you are about to place to make informed decisions.

Tutorial.title: Impulse Control
Tutorial.description: Receive a warning when making high-risk bets to reconsider your options and bet responsibly.

Tutorial.title: Glossary
Tutorial.description: Refresh your understanding of betting terms anytime from your dashboard.

Tutorial.title: Goals
Tutorial.description: Set and track your betting goals through your dashboard to stay focused and motivated.

Tutorial.title: Habits
Tutorial.description: Review your recent betting habits to understand your betting patterns and adjust strategies accordingly.

Tutorial.title: Time Out
Tutorial.description: Use this feature to take breaks from betting when you feel it's necessary to maintain control.

Tutorial.title: Settings
Tutorial.description: Adjust your daily betting limits and timeout durations to customize your betting experience.

Tutorial.title: Conclusion
Tutorial.description: Remember to have fun and gamble responsibly. Enjoy your betting experience within your limits.

General.definition: A measure of the likelihood of a particular outcome in a sporting event.
A bet on the margin of victory in a game.
A bet on a team or player to win a game or event outright, without a point spread.
A bet on whether the total points scored by both teams will exceed (over) or be less than (under) a specified number set by the bookmaker.
A combination of two or more bets in which all must win for the bettor to be victorious, resulting in a higher payout.
Bets on the outcome of a future event, such as a championship or season, typically placed before the event starts.
A wager on specific occurrences or non-occurrences within a game, often unrelated to the final score.

Baseball.definition: A point spread used in baseball games, reflecting the number of runs by which a team is favored over the opponent.
A bet on the total number of runs scored in all baseball games on a particular day.
A declared void bet due to various reasons such as postponement, resulting in the return of all wagers.
A bet on how many total bases a player will earn in a game, with each hit contributing a certain number of bases.

Basketball.definition: A proposition bet on how many rebounds a particular player will accumulate in a game.
Betting on the outcome or total score of a specific quarter in a basketball game.
A game where the teams are so closely matched that there is no favorite or underdog; you simply pick the winner.

Football.definition: Refers to the record of a team in relation to the point spread as opposed to the straight-up outcome of games.
When a team exceeds the point spread set by the sportsbook.
A type of bet that allows the bettor to combine bets on two different games and adjust the spreads for both games.

Tennis.definition: A type of bet where the bettor predicts the exact score by which a player will win a set.
A type of bet where the bettor predicts which player will win the entire tennis match.
A type of bet where the bettor predicts whether the total number of games played in a match will be over or under a specified number set by the sportsbook.
A situation where the score is tied at 6 games all in a set, and a tiebreaker game is played to determine the winner of the set.

Hockey.definition: A point spread used in hockey games, reflecting the number of goals by which a team is favored over the opponent.
A type of bet where the bettor predicts the outcome or total score of the first period of a hockey game.
A type of bet where the bettor predicts which team will win the Stanley Cup at the end of the NHL season.

Soccer.definition: A type of bet where the stake is refunded if the match ends in a draw, but the bettor wins if their selected team wins.
A type of bet where the bettor predicts which player will score the first goal in the match.
A type of bet where the weaker team is given a handicap to level the playing field, often in increments of 0.25 goals to eliminate the possibility of a draw.
A type of bet where the bettor predicts the exact final score of the match.

betTypeDescriptions.Money Line: Bet on who will win the game. Negative odds indicate favorites, positive odds indicate underdogs.
betTypeDescriptions.Spread: Bet on the point spread between two teams. The favorite must overcome the spread to win.
betTypeDescriptions.Total Points: Bet on the total points scored in the game, either over or under a specified number.
betTypeDescriptions.Run Line: Specific to baseball, similar to a point spread but always at -1.5 or +1.5 for the favorite or underdog.
betTypeDescriptions.Total Runs: Bet on the total runs scored in a baseball game, either over or under a specified number.
betTypeDescriptions.Match Winner: Bet on which player will win the match. Negative odds indicate favorites, positive odds indicate underdogs.
betTypeDescriptions.Set Betting: Predict the outcome of the match in terms of sets won by each player.
betTypeDescriptions.Total Games: Bet on the total number of games played in the match, either over or under a specified number.
betTypeDescriptions.Puck Line: Similar to a point spread but always at -1.5 or +1.5 for the favorite or underdog in hockey.
betTypeDescriptions.Total Goals: Bet on the total number of goals scored in the hockey game, either over or under a specified number.
betTypeDescriptions.Asian Handicap: A form of betting that levels the playing field by giving one team a virtual advantage or disadvantage, usually in terms of goals or points.
